titles.title: Capital Access for Small Community Financial Institutions Act of 2013
To amend the Federal Home Loan Bank Act to allow non-Federally insured credit unions to become members of a Federal Home Loan Bank.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary: 5/7/2013--Introduced. Capital Access for Small Community Financial Institutions Act of 2013 - Amends the Federal Home Loan Bank Act to make a state credit union eligible for membership in the Federal Home Loan Bank system.
